participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Easygoing and passionate about sports, Jake enjoys thrilling experiences and is a big fan of music.
participant_1.background: my favorite food is mexican food. i am a construction worker. in my free time i like to watch nascar racing and ufc. my favorite band is aerosmith.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Energetic and health-conscious, Emily loves to stay active and enjoys spending time with her dogs.
participant_2.background: i like doing the treadmill and rowing machine. i go to the gym regularly. i have short hair. two dogs live with me.
